Name: Frost Operative
Title: Filtered in Liquidation: Frost Operative
Desc: Selected while still children, they can only become an "Operative" after many long years of training and teaching, after countless rounds have winnowed the field.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Frost Operative

C121042.Name: Onslaught Stance
C121042.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deals 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters affected by <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

C122.Name: Bond of Life
C122.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every $[K3] it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

21044.Name: Blood-Bonded Shadow
21044.Desc: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character uses a Skill:</color> Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> to the opponent's active character with $[K3] equal to (this Skill's finalized DMG total -2). (Max 5 stacks)

C122.Name: Bond of Life
C122.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every $[K3] it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
